contactForm.title: Send your question

accountCreation.title: Open an account
accountCreation.modalSubtitle: Open your account in a few steps
accountCreation.step1Subtitle: Let's start with your basic information
accountCreation.step2Subtitle: Help us get to know you better
accountCreation.step3Subtitle: Choose the account type that fits your needs
accountCreation.step4Subtitle: Review your information and accept our terms
accountCreation.openingReasonPlaceholder: Briefly describe why you wish to open this account...
accountCreation.acceptConditions: I accept the terms and conditions
accountCreation.acceptConditionsFull: I accept the general terms of use and confirm that the information provided is accurate. I understand that my account will be finalized in branch with original documents. *
accountCreation.success: Your request has been sent successfully!
accountCreation.successMessage: Your email client will open with all the information you have provided. Please verify the details and send the email to complete your account opening request.
accountCreation.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
accountCreation.validationError: Please fill in all required fields before continuing.
accountCreation.acceptRequiredError: You must accept the terms to continue

masoAdhesion.condition1: Valid ID document (National ID, Passport, etc.)
masoAdhesion.acceptCheckbox: I accept the MASO membership conditions and confirm that the information provided is accurate. *
